output_group.name: REP test data for climate means

output.name: Runoff as Precip plus GW minus AET minus RAINEVAP minus SNOWEVAP (mm H2O)
ET_YR in forest (mm H2O)
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0

output.name: SNOWEVAP_Y in forest (mm H2O)
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0

output.name: RAINEVAP_Y in forest (mm H2O)
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0

output.name: MAX_ET_YR in forest (mm H2O)
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0

output_group.name: REP Quick Check (inches H2O ave over irrigated area)

output.name: AET (inches H2O ave over irrigated area)
Precip (inches H2O ave over irrigated area)
Irrigation (inches H2O ave over irrigated area)
Irrigation from GW (inches H2O ave over irrigated area)

output_group.name: REP Quick Check (ccf H2O per day)

output.name: Rural domestic H2O demand without WR (ccf H2O per day)
output.query: POP>0 and UGB=0 and WR_MUNI=0

output.name: Rural domestic H2O supplied without WR (ccf H2O per day)
output.query: POP>0 and UGB=0 and WR_MUNI=0

output.name: Groundwater irrigation water rights WR_IRRIG_G=1 (number of IDUs)
Surface water irrigation water rights WR_IRRIG_S=1 (number of IDUs)
Decision to irrigate IRRIGATION=1 (number of IDUs)
Transient irrigation water shortages WR_SHORTG=1 (number of IDUs)
Persistent irrigation water shortages WR_SHORTG=2 (number of IDUs)
Water right shutoffs WR_SHUTOFF=1 (number of IDUs)
Wildfire (ac)
output.query: DISTURB=23 {Stand-replacing wildfire}

output.name: Timber harvest (ac)
output.query: DISTURB=1 {Harvest} and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0

output.name: Timber harvest from all public lands (ac)
output.query: DISTURB=1 {Harvest} and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {Federal} or OWNER=3 {State} or OWNER=4 {County})

output.name: Timber harvest from protected public lands (ac)
output.query: DISTURB=1 {Harvest} and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {Federal} or OWNER=3 {State} or OWNER=4 {County}) and CONSERVE>0

output.name: Timber harvest from unprotected public lands (ac)
output.query: DISTURB=1 {Harvest} and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {Federal} or OWNER=3 {State} or OWNER=4 {County}) and CONSERVE=0

output.name: Timber harvest from private lands (ac)
output.query: DISTURB=1 {Harvest} and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=0 {private, non-industrial} or OWNER=1 {private industrial forest})

output.name: Private timber >= 40 yrs (ac)
output.query: AGECLASS >= 40 and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=0 {private, non-industrial} or OWNER=1 {private industrial forest})

output.name: All public timber >= 40 and <= 80 yrs (ac)
output.query: AGECLASS >= 40 and AGECLASS <= 80 and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {federal} or OWNER=3 {state} or OWNER=4 {county})

output.name: Protected public timber >= 40 and <= 80 yrs (ac)
output.query: AGECLASS >= 40 and AGECLASS <= 80 and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {federal} or OWNER=3 {state} or OWNER=4 {county}) and CONSERVE>0

output.name: Unprotected public timber >= 40 and <= 80 yrs (ac)
output.query: AGECLASS >= 40 and AGECLASS <= 80 and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {federal} or OWNER=3 {state} or OWNER=4 {county}) and CONSERVE=0

output.name: Unprotected public timber >= 40 ayrs (ac)
output.query: AGECLASS >= 40 and LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {federal} or OWNER=3 {state} or OWNER=4 {county}) and CONSERVE=0

output.name: Forest disequilibrium with climate (ac)
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and DISTURB>100 and DISTURB<200

output.name: LAI
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0

output.name: LAI on public lands
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=2 {Federal} or OWNER=3 {State} or OWNER=4 {County})

output.name: LAI on private lands
output.query: LULC_A=4 and PVT>0 and (OWNER=0 {private, non-industrial} or OWNER=1 {private industrial forest})
